hero.caption: Design and development of websites and mobile apps, with a focus on great user experience and modern technologies

portfolio.title: My Work
portfolio.subtitle: I build high-quality websites and mobile applications focused on clean design, smooth user experience, and modern technologies. Here are selected projects I developed — from idea and UI/UX to a fully deployed product.
portfolio.point1: Modern business websites — fast, responsive, and conversion-optimized.
portfolio.point2: React Native mobile apps — smooth UX for both iOS and Android.
portfolio.point3: Custom admin dashboards — intuitive management tools built with React.
portfolio.point4: AI-powered solutions — smart interfaces and automated workflows.

about.title: About
about.headline: Hi, I'm Tamar Laufer
about.paragraph1:
I'm a freelance developer specializing in creating and designing modern websites and digital products.
I love taking an idea and turning it into a clear, smooth, and beautifully crafted experience.
about.paragraph2:
Over the years, I've worked on a variety of practical projects.
I designed interfaces, solved real challenges, and focused on building simple and enjoyable experiences.
about.paragraph3:
As a freelancer, I'm flexible, dedicated, and attentive.
I believe in clear communication, thoughtful work, and creating a final product that feels polished and truly fits your needs.
